page.title: 06EMPLOYMENT
page.content: The area coded 05040180 which was surveyed by Evelyns School has 7970 employed males.166 are employed in agriculture,energy and water;2548 are employed in manufacturing;846 are employed in construction;1098 are employed in distribution and catering;1417are employed in transport and 1806 are employed in other services.5360 females are employed:59 in agriculture,energy and water;1218 in manufacturing;149 in construction; 1317 in distribution and catering;408 in transport and 2147 in other services.These figures are to the nearest whole person.The total number of men and women working in the wards of Colham,Cowley,West Drayton and Yiewsley is 13330.There are 17056 unemployed people.The figures quoted are for people over the age of 16.
